suggestions.reasoning: Relaxing confluence_gap_min from 19.2 to 25.0 captures more trades since missed profitable trades averaged 27.8. Lowering confluence_score_min from 15 to 12 increases trade frequency. Adding 'normal' volume captures the 86.5% of profitable trades that weren't high volume. Implementing tiered take-profit levels (25%, 35%, 25%, 15% position sizes) with trailing stops addresses the early exit problem by letting winners run longer while protecting gains. Tighter 1.2% stop-loss improves risk/reward ratio to boost profit factor above 1.0.

Your current confluence_gap_min (23.04) is excluding profitable trades that average 25.1 gap - lowering to 20 captures more opportunities. Reducing confluence_score_min from 12 to 10 increases trade frequency. Adding 'low' volume captures the 82.3% of missed trades in normal volume conditions. Implementing scaled take profits (8%, 15%, 25%, 40%) addresses the early exit problem by taking partial profits while letting winners run longer. A 4.5% stop loss balances risk with the 32% max drawdown issue.

Lower confluence requirements to capture missed trades (avg 25.1 vs current 23.04 min), reduced score threshold to increase trade frequency, expanded volume criteria since 17.7% of missed trades had varied volume patterns, implemented tiered profit-taking (25% at each level) to reduce early exits while protecting gains, and tighter stop-loss to improve profit factor by cutting losers faster than winners.
